9:30am We stop again. I only write when I am woken up. I seem to be in better mood than yesterday.
7:45am: 2 flavored-waters and a coffee in Weed, California.
5:30am On the bus after 3 bowls of Raisin Bran and 30 mins of sleep.

Texting While Driving: the podcast
United: no free admit to lounge via my Am Ex. Guy behind me got me in (for free) as his guest. A towncar, now this! Wheee!
I've never cursed at an airline employee... until today. Guess what, employee, some people get confused and dislike being talked down to.
omg they got me a Towncar for the same price as a taxi. And I was gonna take the subway and the bus? Fuck that!
Waiting in Biltmore Hotel Lobby in downtown LA for taxi man to tell me when taxi arrives. Classy!
NPR reporter ends story with her own firing. http://tinyurl.com/a98mmp
The roof of The Standard for a quick coffee before leaving LA.
